gameoflife

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameoflife.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    The Sound class provides support for sound in the game. Sound provides a constructor for creating sound objects used for playing music and sound effects (Sound), play/pause the sound (playSound, pauseSound) and stop the sound (stopSound).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Sound.SoundTypes
      Enumeration that holds the avilable sound types.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sound(Sound.SoundTypes soundType)
      Creates a sound object using a specific SoundType.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void pauseSound()
      Pauses sound from player.
      protected void playSound()
      Plays sound from player.
      protected void stopSound()
      Stops sound from player.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sound

        public Sound(Sound.SoundTypes soundType)
        Creates a sound object using a specific SoundType.
        Parameters:
        soundType - Used for selecting the correct audio file.

    • Method Detail

      • playSound

        protected void playSound()
        Plays sound from player. The audio is chosen when the Sound object is initialized

      • pauseSound

        protected void pauseSound()
        Pauses sound from player. The audio is chosen when the Sound object is initialized

      • stopSound

        protected void stopSound()
        Stops sound from player. The audio is chosen when the Sound object is initialized
